mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NUM FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NAME='SYSTEM'
SELECT CHAT_ROOM,CHAT_NAME,MSG_CONT,CHAT_USER,MSG_DATE FROM CHAT_MSG JOIN CHAT_ROOM USING(CHAT_ROOM) WHERE CHAT_ROOM=#{roomId}

select chat_room,chat_name,msg_cont,chat_user,msg_date from(select rownum rnum,a.* from (select chat_room,chat_name,msg_cont,chat_user,msg_date from chat_msg join chat_room using(chat_room) where chat_room=#{rList} order by msg_date DESC)a ) where rnum=1
SELECT CHAT_MSG,CHAT_USER,MSG_CONT,MSG_DATE,MSG_STAT FROM CHAT_MSG WHERE CHAT_ROOM=#{roomId} ORDER BY MSG_DATE ASC
SELECT CHAT_ROOM,ROWNUM FROM (SELECT CHAT_ROOM FROM CHAT_ROOM ORDER BY CHAT_CREATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHAT_JOIN WHERE CHAT_USER =#{userId} AND CHAT_ROOM=#{roomId}
